entry.title: Moonbirds Shatter OpenSea Records With $240M Traded Within Four Days Of Launch
entry.summary: Moonbirds have taken the NFT world by storm with over $110M traded on launch day.

entry.title: Ethereum Foundation Reveals 80% of Treasury Holdings Are Held In ETH
entry.summary: The Ethereum Foundation holds 80% of its Treasury reserves in ETH.

entry.title: Yearn Creator Andre Cronje Slams Crypto Culture, Pivots To ‘Regulated Crypto’
entry.summary: DeFi developer Andre Cronje now seeks to embrace regulation of the industry.

entry.title: MakerDAO Steps Up Multichain Strategy With StarkNet Rollout
entry.summary: MakerDAO plans to deploy on StarkNet on April 28.

entry.title: Forcing Utility On The SEC
entry.summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission under Chair Gensler is a rigid challenger of the crypto industry in its aggressive application of an age-old regime to digital assets. Even without the 97 enforcement actions and billions in imposed penalties, the SEC has effectively impaired the industry from advancing digital innovation and technology by stalling approval … Forcing Utility On The SEC Read More »
